answers.answer: I don't think your gonna die.You can control you high blood pressure with meds.You have RLS maybe? I would reocmmend starting to eat healther and starting to exercise daily if possible.Perhaps buy a treadmil.
You are a diabetic, and you have high blood pressure. If you don't do something to control both, you could indeed die. Not this week or month, but...

I don't know if you are a male or female, but your hct/hgb results look fine to me. In my opinion, your HDL (good cholesterol) is higher, therefore lowering your risk for heart disease.Relax.... continue to follow-up with your physician as needed.

i had the same problem i always had low b/p and all of the sodden it was 170\130 and i was scared i went to a cardiologist and did stress tests turned out i only needed to exercize i also had the tingling in my leg but the tingling in the face is your blood pressure and the night probs with your legs could be rls restless leg syndrome it can make a person misserable.. so hang in there lower your cholesteral and eat right and exercize you will felel better i promise also have you had your doctor check for any blockages in your kidneys?  if you would like you can email me at ***@****

Although this clinical history is concerning for many health conditions, diabetes is diagnosed with a blood sugar or hemaglobin A1c, neither of which are listed here.Please follow up with your regular doc for your symptoms and explanation of lab results.Enoch Choi, MD

I'm 49 years old  and weigh 195 .and I have hiigh blood pressure .I moved to Texas 6 years ago .Since move health going down hill.Everytime gone to doctor illness is a sinus infection.. I was told last year I have heart palputations .The extra beats was burned out .I'm now on medications for that .I have gained over 30 pounds since last year.I take a total of 6 pills a day .I when in doctor office for current dizziness add another 2 to 3 extra pills daily.I  was told I'm not diabetic.I feel dizzy most of the time and when gone to doctor is told a sinus infection or blood pressue is up.I'really need to know why i feel this way .medications is not working .I have had an MRI AND Cat scam both found nothing.  The doctors seems to be just milking my insurance company .I do not think they want me to feel better.with each medication with added side effects..WHAT MUST I DO ? I'M MISERABLE.HELP....
Hi TexasIf you taking antibiotics now, STOP -- especially if it is cirpo or levaquin.  See a doctor who knows about the reaction of certain antibiotics and the symptoms you describe.Good luck.Phyllis

question: I have lab results and they are scaring me. Can't see a doctor until next week. Maybe someone can tell me what they mean. First of all I wanted you to know what brought me to the doctors in the first place.I have high blood pressure all of a sudden. 180/94 approx. without meds. Now Im taking Norvasc. I have tingling and weird numbness in my legs even when I am moving around. Sometimes I get numbness in my arms also. My legs are especially at night. The numbness is worse at night but can happen through out the day. I am overweight 240 at 5'4". I have had a lot of heavy duty stress recently.What do you think?My lab results were chol-221 mghdl chol- 53 mgtrig- 84 mgcalc ldl- 152 mghemoglobin 12.6 g/dLhematocrit 39.7%MPV 7.4 flHchc 31.7%any ideas what is wrong with me? Am I going to die?
title: What is wrong with me? High blood pressure and weird lab results.
